text: Ndikulankhula kwawo koti: “Ife tidamupha Messiya, Yesu mwana wamwamuna wa Maria, Mthenga wa Mulungu,” koma iwo sadamuphe ayi ndipo sadampachike koma maonekedwe a Yesu anaikidwa pa munthu wina ndipo iwo amene amatsutsa za izo ndi okaika. Iwo sadziwa chili chonse, koma akutsatira nkhani za m’maluwa. Ndithudi iwo sadamuphe ayi
